ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.TYPESRC: BEGIN OF c_light, * no_light TYPE t_light VALUE 0, * red TYPE t_light VALUE 1, * yellow TYPE t_light VALUE 2, * green TYPE t_light VALUE 3, no TYPE td_light VALUE ICON_LIGHT_OUT, red TYPE td_light VALUE ICON_RED_LIGHT, yellow TYPE td_light VALUE ICON_YELLOW_LIGHT, green TYPE td_light VALUE ICON_GREEN_LIGHT, END OF c_light

LOCAL.TYPES: *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* LOCAL HELPER CLASSES
LOCAL.MACROS: *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY MACRO DEFINITIONS YOU NEED *"* IN THE IMPLEMENTATION PART OF THE CLASS

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_cont TYPE to_container. DATA obj_list TYPE to_list. DATA obj TYPE to_component. DATA _objname TYPE string. DATA _objtype TYPE string. DATA _cx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx.
IF objtype IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>missing_objtype. * MESSAGE s208(00) WITH 'object type required'. * EXIT. ELSEIF name IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>missing_name. * MESSAGE s208(00) WITH 'object name required'. * EXIT. ENDIF.
TRY. CALL METHOD _load EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING container = o_cont.
CREATE OBJECT obj. obj->set_type( objtype ). _objname = name. obj->set_name( _objname ).
IF obj->connector_exists( ) = zaplink_component=>connexists-not_exists. " OR NOT obj->connector( ) IS BOUND. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ZAPLINK_CX_GUI EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>connector_not_exists type = objtype. ENDIF.
CREATE OBJECT obj_list. obj_list->add( obj ). obj_list->select( obj ).
o_cont->add_components( obj_list ).
CALL METHOD _save EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING container = o_cont.
CATCH zaplink_cx INTO _cx. CREATE OBJECT o_exception EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error prev_cx = _cx. o_exception->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception.
ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE: if not action is initial. list->SELECT_DEFAULT( action ). endif. list->change_selection( ). *DATA alv TYPE tt_obj_list. * * alv = conv_list_alv( list = list * action = action ). * * CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY' * EXPORTING ** i_callback_program = 'ZSAPLINK' ** i_callback_pf_status_set = 'PF_STATUS_SET' ** i_callback_user_command = 'USER_COMMAND_USER' * i_grid_title = 'Select objects'(lst) * it_fieldcat = alv_list-fields * is_layout = alv_list-layout * TABLES * t_outtab = alv * EXCEPTIONS * OTHERS = 0. * * CALL METHOD update_list_from_alv * EXPORTING * alv = alv * CHANGING * list = list.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE: *============================================== *========== APPLICATION_LOG =========== *============================================== CREATE OBJECT application_log. CALL METHOD application_log->init EXPORTING id_object = ballog_object id_subobject = ballog_subobject * id_extnumber = auto_upd_custo = abap_true id_activity = zaplink_message_collector=>act_create EXCEPTIONS error = 1 OTHERS = 2. IF sy-subrc <> 0. * MESSAGE ID SY-MSGID TYPE SY-MSGTY NUMBER SY-MSGNO * WITH SY-MSGV1 SY-MSGV2 SY-MSGV3 SY-MSGV4. ENDIF.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Convert LIMU entries to R3TR Entries

ITEM.SOURCE:
* From TRINT_OBJECT_TABLE * HINT TRINT_OLE_SORT_COMPRESS * HINT TR_SORT_OBJECT_AND_KEY_LIST DATA: _objlist LIKE LINE OF result, w_tadir TYPE tadir. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <limu> LIKE LINE OF e071.
LOOP AT e071 ASSIGNING <limu>. CLEAR: _objlist. IF <limu>-pgmid = 'R3TR'. _objlist-type = <limu>-object. _objlist-name = <limu>-obj_name. ELSE. CALL FUNCTION 'TR_CHECK_TYPE' EXPORTING wi_e071 = <limu> * IV_TRANSLATE_OBJNAME = ' ' IMPORTING * PE_RESULT = * WE_E071 = * WE_LOCK_KEY = we_tadir = w_tadir * WE_COMPLETE_ONLY = * WE_CATEGORY = * WE_CLI_DEP = * WE_TABLE_TYP = * WE_TABLE_CONTFLAG = * PE_NAME_TOO_LONG = * EV_NO_OBJECT_NAME = * EV_R3TRTEXT_SYNTAXERROR = * EV_LANGTYP = * EV_LANGTYPA = * EV_LOGO_OBJ = * EV_CURR_SETTING = * EV_NAME_TOO_LONG_FOR_OLD = * EV_NAME_WITH_NONSTANDARD_CHARS = * EV_NAMESPACE = * EV_INVALID_PREFIX_SYNTAX = * EV_PREFIX_NOT_ALLOWED = * EV_CASE_SENSITIVE = * EV_OBJLEN = * EV_INVALID_LANGUAGE_FIELD = . _objlist-type = w_tadir-object. _objlist-name = w_tadir-obj_name. ENDIF. IF _objlist IS NOT INITIAL. APPEND _objlist TO result. ENDIF. ENDLOOP.
SORT result BY type name. DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM result COMPARING type name.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA nug_info TYPE ts_contdata. DATA container TYPE to_container. DATA xml TYPE string. DATA def_fn TYPE td_filename. DATA o_file TYPE to_file.
IF name IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>missing_container_name. * MESSAGE s208(00) WITH 'enter name of new nugget to be created'. * EXIT. ENDIF.
CONCATENATE name '.train.XML' INTO def_fn. IF filename IS INITIAL. o_file = create_file( filename = def_fn ). ELSE. o_file = create_file( filename = filename ). ENDIF. o_file->save_dialog( def_fn ).
nug_info-name = name. * TRY. container = zaplink_container=>create_new( o_file = o_file data = nug_info ). container->save_to_file( ). * CATCH zaplink_cx_container. * ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE: DATA _cx TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_file. TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( filetype ). o_file->set_filename( filename ). CATCH zaplink_cx_file INTO _cx. RAISE EXCEPTION _cx. ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_cont TYPE to_container. DATA _component TYPE to_component. * DATA o_list TYPE to_list. DATA cx_component TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_component.
TRY. CALL METHOD _get_objlist EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING * list = o_list container = o_cont. CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.
TRY. CALL METHOD o_cont->add_components( objlist ).
TRY.
CALL METHOD _save EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING container = o_cont.
CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.
CATCH zaplink_cx_component INTO cx_component. CREATE OBJECT o_exception EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error prev_cx = cx_component. o_exception->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Get object list from Transport request

ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA objlist TYPE tt_e071. DATA r_devc TYPE tr_packages. DATA r_level TYPE tr_packages.
* Package selection SELECT devclass devclass devclass FROM tdevc INTO TABLE r_devc WHERE devclass IN packages.
* Package extention IF ext = abap_true. r_level = r_devc . WHILE NOT r_level[] IS INITIAL. SORT r_level BY low. DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM r_level COMPARING low.
SELECT devclass devclass devclass FROM tdevc INTO TABLE r_level FOR ALL ENTRIES IN r_level WHERE parentcl = r_level-low. APPEND LINES OF r_level TO r_devc. ENDWHILE. ENDIF.
SORT r_devc BY low. DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM r_devc COMPARING low.
IF NOT r_devc IS INITIAL. SELECT object obj_name INTO TABLE result FROM tadir FOR ALL ENTRIES IN r_devc WHERE devclass = r_devc-low. ENDIF.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL

ITEM.DESCRIPT: Get object list from Transport request

ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA objlist TYPE tt_e071. * data keys TYPE TT_COMPKEYS. data r_trs TYPE tr_tr.
* TR SELECT trkorr trkorr trkorr FROM e070 INTO TABLE r_trs WHERE trkorr IN tr.
* TR Tasks if not released SELECT trkorr trkorr trkorr FROM e070 APPENDING TABLE r_trs WHERE strkorr IN tr AND ( trstatus = 'D' " Modifiable OR trstatus = 'O' " Release started OR trstatus = 'L' ). " Modifiable locked
* Alternative : direct but 2 range * SELECT trkorr trkorr trkorr * INTO TABLE r_trs * from V_E071EU * where TRKORR in tr OR ( * STRKORR in tr * and ( TRSTATUS = 'D' OR " Modifiable * TRSTATUS = 'O' OR " Release started * TRSTATUS = 'L') " Modifiable locked * ).
SORT r_trs BY low. DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM r_trs COMPARING low.
IF NOT r_trs IS INITIAL. SELECT * FROM e071 INTO TABLE objlist FOR ALL ENTRIES IN r_trs WHERE trkorr = r_trs-low.
* keys = CONV_LIMU_2_R3TR( objlist ). * create OBJECT result. * result->add_keys( keys ). result = CONV_LIMU_2_R3TR( objlist ). ENDIF.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_cont TYPE to_container. DATA o_comp TYPE to_component.
TRY. CALL METHOD _get_objlist EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING list = list container = o_cont * cont_name = . CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_cont TYPE to_container. data _cx type ref to zaplink_cx.
TRY. CALL METHOD _get_objlist EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING list = list container = o_cont cont_name = nuggetname.
* IF my_badi IS BOUND. * TRY. * CALL METHOD my_badi->nug_imp_at_load * EXPORTING * nugget = nugg * CHANGING * list = list. * CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_exception. * RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. * ENDTRY. * ENDIF.
list->select_default( ZAPLINK_LIST=>SEL_ACTIONS-import ). list->change_selection( ).
* IF my_badi IS BOUND. * TRY. * CALL METHOD my_badi->nug_imp_before * EXPORTING * nugget = nugg * CHANGING * list = list. * CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_exception. * RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. * ENDTRY. * ENDIF.
o_cont->transport_to_sap( list ).
* IF my_badi IS BOUND. * TRY. * CALL METHOD my_badi->nug_imp_after * EXPORTING * nugget = nugg * CHANGING * list = list. * CATCH zaplink_cx INTO o_exception. * RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. * ENDTRY. * ENDIF. * raise event after_nugget_import * exporting * nugget = * nuggetname = * list = * .
CATCH zaplink_cx INTO _cx. CREATE OBJECT o_exception EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error prev_cx = _cx. o_exception->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception.
ENDTRY.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_list TYPE to_list. DATA o_comp TYPE to_component. DATA o_cont TYPE to_container.
TRY. CALL METHOD _get_objlist EXPORTING file = nugget IMPORTING list = o_list container = o_cont cont_name = name. CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.
IF list IS BOUND. o_list->keep_commun_list( list ). ENDIF.
o_list->select_default( zaplink_list=>sel_actions-uninstall ). o_list->change_selection( ).
o_cont->uninstall_from_sap( o_list ).
list = o_list.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
TRY. CALL METHOD _load EXPORTING file = file IMPORTING container = container cont_name = cont_name. CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.
CHECK container IS BOUND. list = container->get_content( ).

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_file TYPE TO_file.
IF file IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>missing_filename. * MESSAGE s208(00) WITH 'nugget filename required'. * EXIT. ENDIF.
CALL METHOD application_log->add EXPORTING * is_message = id_msgty = 'I' id_msgid = 'ZAPLINK_GUI' id_msgno = '002' id_msgv1 = file * id_msgv2 = * id_msgv3 = * id_msgv4 = * id_msgd1 = * id_msgd2 = * id_msgd3 = * id_msgd4 = * id_detlevel = * if_cumulate = * id_probclass = * id_index = * id_sublog = * IMPORTING * es_message = . * o_file = CREATE_FILE( filename = NUGGET_FILE ). CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>c_ft_local ). o_file->set_filename( file ). * o_file->set_filekind( zaplink_file_zip=>filekinds-zipped ). CREATE OBJECT container EXPORTING o_file = o_file. * TRY. container->load_from_file( ). * CATCH zaplink_cx_gui INTO o_exception. * RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx_gui * EXPORTING * textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>file_error * messages = application_log * prev_cx = o_exception. * ENDTRY..
IF NOT container IS BOUND. * RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zaplink_cx EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error. ENDIF.

ITEM.AUTHOR: TBENSIAL
ITEM.SOURCE:
DATA o_file TYPE to_file. DATA _fn TYPE td_filename. DATA cx_file TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_file. DATA cx_cont TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx_container.
TRY. CREATE OBJECT o_file. o_file->set_filetype( zaplink_file=>c_ft_local ). _fn = file. IF _fn IS INITIAL. CALL METHOD o_file->save_dialog EXPORTING filename = _fn. ENDIF. o_file->set_filename( _fn ). CATCH zaplink_cx_file INTO cx_file. CREATE OBJECT o_exception EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error prev_cx = cx_file. o_exception->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.
TRY. container->save_to_file( o_file ). CATCH zaplink_cx_container INTO cx_cont. CREATE OBJECT o_exception EXPORTING textid = zaplink_cx_gui=>system_error prev_cx = cx_file. o_exception->update( ). RAISE EXCEPTION o_exception. ENDTRY.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_object, select TYPE flag, type TYPE td_comptype, typ_txt TYPE string, name TYPE td_compname, plugin TYPE td_light, "type pools ICON status TYPE td_light, "type pools ICON msg TYPE string, devclass TYPE tadir-devclass, srcsystem TYPE tadir-srcsystem, END OF ts_object
TT_E071 type STANDARD TABLE OF e071 with DEFAULT KEY
tt_obj_list TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_object with DEFAULT KEY
BEGIN OF t_alv, fields TYPE slis_t_fieldcat_alv, layout TYPE slis_layout_alv, END OF t_alv
